title: Marco Riccioni
text:
Marco Riccioni (<a href="Teramo">Teramo</a>, 19 October 1997) is an Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> <a href="Prop%20%28rugby%20union%29">prop</a> who currently plays for <a href="Saracens%20F.C.">Saracens</a> and <a href="Italy%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy</a>. 
Riccioni played with Italian <a href="Pro14">Pro14</a> team <a href="Benetton%20Rugby">Benetton</a> from <a href="2017%E2%80%9318%20Pro14">2017</a> to <a href="2020%E2%80%9321%20Pro14">2021</a>.
He joins <a href="Saracens%20F.C.">Saracens</a> ahead of the 2021–22 season. 
From 2015 to 2017, Riccioni was named in the <a href="Italy%20national%20under-20%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy Under 20</a> squad. On 18 August 2019, he was named in the final 31-man squad for the <a href="2019%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2019 Rugby World Cup</a>.
